issue.title: [C++] Use GTEST_SKIP in parquet encoding tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10746](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10746). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per a TODO left in ARROW-3769 / #3721 we can now use the GTEST_SKIP macro in parquet/encoding-test.cpp. GTEST_SKIP was added in gtest 1.10.0 so this involves bumping our minimal gtest version from 1.8.1

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10746?focusedCommentId=17239410) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
+1. We can also use it elsewhere.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10746?focusedCommentId=17244957) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8782
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8782>
